item.title: Convert Blog from Wordpress Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: I’ve had this small personal website for some time now, adding from time to time some stuff mainly related to Oracle Analytics, the Italian Oracle User Group and personal speaking experiences. I was running it on Wordpress.com which was providing a nice completely managed experience: I didn’t have to care about hosting, versioning, SSL etc, all was managed by the platform. I just had to focus on content writing and on top of it I had, out of the box, nice dashboards showing visitors of the page and other blog stats.
